projects.title: Koinpark Crypto Currency Exchange & Admin Panel
projects.bodyText:
Crypto Currency Exchange platform with multiple interconnected panels including Koinpark.com, KPK Park, KPK Park Admin,
 Support Panel, Main Admin Panel, OTC Panel, and CRM Admin Panel. The project involved maintaining existing modules, creating new modules, revamping the UI.

projects.title: Nimalaan Energies Web Application
projects.bodyText: Nimalaan Energies Web Application is a feature-rich platform designed to offer a /n comprehensive suite of tools for both users and administrators. The application includes a modern, /n responsive website with multiple web pages, a detailed enquiry form, and a robust job portal.

projects.title: Puppy'sBakery E -Commerce Web Application
projects.bodyText: Puppy's Bakery E-Commerce Web Application is a user-centric platform designed to /n showcase Puppy's Bakery's products to a broader audience. The project includes a user portal and anadmin portal with multiple modules, /n ensuring a seamless shopping experience and efficient backend management.

projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support
